note: Associate professor @ Jagiellonian University, interested in digital culture, new media art, and electronic literature. A member of the Board of Directors of Electronic Literature. An avid permaculturalist, tending to a perm cultural garden on Polish-Slovakian borderland, in Pieniny mountains. Occasionally ventures into music (improv) and sound art (field recordings). Likes clouds, orchids, all waterbodies, and machines.
